luis_nlu_framework¶

class nlutestframework.implementations.luis_nlu_framework.LUISNLUFramework(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: nlutestframework.optimizable_nlu_framework.OptimizableNLUFramework

FAKE_VERSION = '1.0'¶
async construct(_global_config, endpoint, authoring_key, *args, runtime_key=None, **kwargs)[source]¶
Parameters

  • _global_config (GlobalConfig) – Global configuration for the whole test framework.

  • endpoint (str) – The endpoint to use to access LUIS, e.g. https://westeurope.api.cognitive.microsoft.com/.

  • authoring_key (str) – The access key for the LUIS authoring API.

  • runtime_key (Optional[str]) – The access key for the LUIS runtime API. Defaults to the authoring key if omitted or set to None.

Return type

None

async unprepareDataSet()[source]¶

This method gives framework implementations the opportunity to execute cleanup steps before preparing for a new data set (or exiting).

Return type

None

async train(training_data)[source]¶

Args: training_data: The data to train on. Must not be empty.

Return type

None

async cleanupTraining()[source]¶

Perform cleanup on the NLU framework. For example, this can include resetting the framework to a pre-training state.

Return type

None
